text: "Hollywood Swinging" is a 1974 song by Kool & the Gang. It was taken from their fourth studio album Wild & Peaceful and went to number 6 in the United States and was a huge crossover hit. ==Track listing== De-Lite Records â€“ DE-561: ==Jamiroquai versions== In 1997, English funk band Jamiroquai covered Hollywood Swinging for the group's compilation album In Stone Jam and the 2005 album The Hits: Reloaded. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Funk songs Category:Kool & the Gang songs Category:Jamiroquai songs
title: Hollywood Swinging
